results.name: a(n) = -1 + (3/2)^(-1 + v(1 + F(4*n - 3)))*(1 + F(4*n - 3)), where v(y) is the 2-adic valuation of y, F(x) = (3*x + 1)/2^v(3*x + 1), and x == 1 (mod 2).
